metadata.title: CVE-2020-36133 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
AOM v2.0.1 was discovered to contain a global buffer overflow via thecomponent av1/encoder/partition_search.h.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36133` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

aom-tools - 3.3.0-2
libaom3 - 3.3.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: aom package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.3.0-2').
